page.title: 13SCHOOLS IN CARNOUSTIE AREA
page.content: There are{two Primary Schools}in the Eastern part of Carnoustie. One is {Panbride,}a{small three-teacher school which, in the past, took its pupils mainly from the outlying districts of the community. Nowadays, however,it is taking a larger percentage of its pupils from the new housing areas which are springing up. The other school,{Carlogie,}is a modern school with a{roll of 440. This was opened in 1976 to meet the educational needs of the increasing population at the Eastern end of Carnoustie. When Carlogie first opened it was right on the perimeter of the new housing development, but, so rapid has been the spread of house building that now, only 9 years later,it is surrounded on all sides by yet more new housing.
